resource.name: equivalence_validation_of_product_data
resource.keywords: Product data equivalence, Product shape data equivalence, Assembly data equivalence, PMI data equivalence, Criteria representation, Inspection requirement, Threshold, Accuracy , Inspection result representation

abstract.p: This part of ISO 10303 provides structured representation of criteria together with inspection requirement, and inspection results for the equivalence validation of product data. It is designed for use in equivalence declaration, equivalence assurance and for representing equivalence inspection result of product data, thus enabling equivalence guaranteed use of product data

resource.scope: This part of ISO 10303 specifies representation of product data equivalence validation information especially focusing on annotated model 3d data. It provides general specifications for the representation of equivalence validation criterion, equivalence inspection requirement, equivalence assessment specification and equivalence inspection result of product data. These specifications are provided so that this part of ISO 10303 can be extended to deal with other constituents of product data than annotated model 3d data in the future. By focusing on annotated model 3d data, detailed specifications for the representation of equivalence validation criterion together with the pertaining inspection requirement, equivalence assessment specification and detailed result of annotated model 3d equivalence inspection are provided.

inscope.li: representation of high level data elements for managing equivalence validation related data;
representation of general equivalence validation criteria for product data;
representation of general equivalence validation criteria for product data associated to the corresponding validation inspection requirements;
representation of general equivalence validation criteria for product data associated to the corresponding assessment specifications;
representation of equivalence validation results of given two product data;

representation of equivalence validation criteria for three dimensional annotated product model data coupled with inspection requirements for the evaluation of equivalence validation criteria and association with the pertinent assessment specifications. Equivalence validation criteria can be used for the representation of requirement, declaration of, or assurance of, equivalence validation of two three dimensional annotated product model data. The target shape data models are equivalent to those defined in ISO 10303-42 or application protocol based on that;

representation of equivalence validation results of the given two three dimensional annotated product model data.
Requirements of product data equivalence is application context-dependent. This part of ISO 10303 provides a means to select appropriate criteria with required thresholds.

outscope.li:
detailed information relating to equivalence validation of product data other than three dimensional annotated product model data;
Though general specifications for the representation of criterion, inspection requirement, assessment specification and inspection result of product data are given, detailed specifications are provided only for annotated model 3d data.
data model to improve equivalence of three dimensional annotated product data;
process model to ensure equivalence of product data.
